Text:
Perfect as always :-) I will seed at least 500% as normal. 

Although I'm still having problems connecting to your torrents TvTeam and I spoke to a few others that say the same, its weird :-\ It takes sometimes over an hour of the torrent sitting there saying its connected to how ever many seeds but it doesn't DL anything, just sits there doing nothing for ages. But anyway its all good and worth the wait :-)

Massive thanks for sharing.
Great Torrent TvTeam, you guys are the best of the best!
